feed.title: SiYuan Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for SiYuan: Fix bugs
entry.content:
Overview

This version fixes some bugs and improves a lot of details.

Changelogs

Below are the detailed changes in this version.

Enhancement

  • Supports some shortcut keys on the mobile
  • When multiple files are selected in the file tree, "Open" is added to the right-click menu
  • Supports rendering the row number column when exporting database
  • Add two shortcuts for block navigation
  • Adjust PDF export footer font size
  • Improve remove image
  • Support convert Base64 image when clipping HTML
  • Internationalization supports Japanese
  • Set the maximum height of the template column edit textarea in the database table view
  • Improve the delete operation of database table view
  • Allow referring to the current database in a "Relation" field
  • Support pasting of database search box in read-only mode
  • Improve clear search button in database table view
  • Synchronize the related entries when the database creates a two-way relation
  • Ignore hidden files when generating asset history
  • Improve HTML code element clipping

Bugfix

  • Shift+â†“ cannot expand the selection of the folded list
  • Browser/Pad stuck on loading interface
  • Notebook settings doc save path does not override global settings in some cases
  • PDF cannot be jumped after annotation
  • Unable to export Data containing symbolic links
  • The interface crashes after maximizing the window on Linux desktop
  • Double-clicking the database asset column causes the interface to freeze
  • Marketplace - Downloaded - Package size in README is empty
  • Clicking a hyperlink does not open the browser on mobile
  • The file name encoding is abnormal after copying the image and pasting it
  • Exception during quick selection of database table view multi-select column
  • The new database entry after binding block is lost in some cases
  • After uninstalling the widget, data synchronization does not clear the widget folder

Refactor

  • Downgrade to Electron v28.3.1

Development

  • Set the default value of item.direction

Download

  • B3log
  • GitHub

entry.title: New release for SiYuan: Fix bugs
entry.content:
Overview

This version fixes some bugs and improves a lot of details.

Changelogs

Below are the detailed changes in this version.

Enhancement

  • Optimize rendering performance of databases containing relation fields
  • Improve database text, email, url and phone field content escaping
  • Improve backlink panel mention expansion configuration
  • Improve responsiveness of code blocks
  • Don't hide error messages when copying them
  • Clear ZWSP when remove tag, code and kbd inline elements
  • Improve sorting for Add to Database
  • Improve link tip
  • Improve editor preview
  • Improve HTML code block clipping
  • Improve database auto-fill value when enabling filter
  • Improve data history tip
  • In read-only mode, new files can be edited
  • Improve Optimize typography for inline math
  • Improve HTML a element clipping
  • Improve browser extension clipping
  • Improve selection text when over blocks
  • Support database table view to load more when read-only
  • The line number field no longer appears in the database attribute panel
  • Improve Japanese translation and theme font rendering
  • Improve multi-language support for click, double-click, and enter
  • Improve doc tree modification time display
  • Support Alt+Click in read-only mode
  • Stick database table view header and footer in read-only mode
  • Improve slash menu
  • Triggering tag selection via # is no longer supported after disabling tag syntax
  • Improve dynamic scroll bar
  • Improve embed/ref block reindex
  • Improve Enter in the last row of the table
  • Support cancel two-way relation when related to the current database
  • Improve the cursor when two images are connected
  • Supports outline highlight with document sync on the mobile
  • Improve two-way relation column name placeholder
  • Improve Display the VIP icon
  • Improve HTML inline code clipping
  • Improve export preview mode
  • The heading block update time is refreshed after editing the blocks under the heading

Bugfix

  • Lost URL content after : when pasting as a link
  • Unable to create a new doc immediately after creating a new entry in the database
  • The database cannot delete entries in rapid succession
  • After uninstalling the plugin, data synchronization does not uninstall it
  • Two-way relation is invalid when related to the current database
  • Convert network assets to local in search cannot be refreshed
  • Undo exception after folding heading is cut
  • The maximum number of tags listed is incorrect
  • HTML block content escaping is incorrect
  • The parent doc cannot be folded after creating a new sub-doc
  • Database table view continuously adds new rows above error
  • Block attributes are not refreshed after data syncing
  • Undo exception after Delete in the last line of the code block
  • Opening notebook repeatedly causes reference count to increase

Document

  • Improve user guide

Development

  • Update plugin loaded-protyle-dynamic parameter positon to position
  • Arch User Repository (AUR) auto release
  • Add a kernel API /api/block/getBlockTreeInfos

Download

  • B3log
  • GitHub

entry.title: New release for SiYuan: Improve web page clipping
entry.content:
Overview

This version improves web page clipping, fixes some bugs and improves a lot of details.

Changelogs

Below are the detailed changes in this version.

Enhancement

  • The browser extension supports Zhihu formula clipping
  • The browser extension supports CSDN formula clipping
  • Add internal commands to command palette
  • If a file with the same name exists during export PDF/Docx, it will be automatically renamed
  • Improve text for Press back again to desktop on Android
  • Improve database table view asset column
  • Prompt for recovery method and retention days settings when deleting documents
  • Improve HTML code element clipping
  • Support for copying block text in read-only database table views
  • Code block word break uses break-word
  • Added floating tip for database Add button
  • Support markdown configuration on the mobile
  • Downgrades the glibc 2.31 version to solve booting failure on Linux
  • Search preview supports HTML tags in inline code content
  • Improve i18n text of export preview tooltips and infos
  • Information such as database titles can no longer be modified in read-only mode
  • Improve HTML table element clipping
  • Improve inline memo export
  • Improve HTML code block clipping
  • Attribute Panel - Database attributes custom sorting
  • Improve main window position restoration after boot on the Desktop
  • Improve HTML h element clipping
  • Support KaTex macro parameters
  • Improve attribute panel text input box
  • Use real theme style value replace var in preview mode
  • Improve read-only mode
  • The database asset field supports parsing pasted links
  • Display link if database asset field title is empty
  • The database asset field supports filling in only the link title
  • Improve block ref text copying
  • Change the sequence number of the ordered list item after duplicating it
  • The browser extension removes the ending / in URL
  • Improve workspace startup stability

Bugfix

  • When the " character exists in the hyperlink element address, the paste cannot be parsed normally
  • Unable to copy HTML block properly
  • Database template field function queryBlocks not defined
  • Attributes cannot be modified after the database table is queried in pages
  • The selection options are inconsistent after pasting data into the database
  • Right-click the database table view column to pop up the exception link menu
  • After selecting the doc in the doc tree, Ctrl+D will not duplicate it
  • Regular replacement text fails
  • Negative numbers are treated as positive numbers when calculating template field values
  • Documents exported in the doc tree can no longer be imported
  • Code block causes abnormal state
  • Rendering exception in export preview mode when custom attribute value has line breaks
  • Some emoji exceptions in the document title

Document

  • Improve user guide shortcuts chapter

Development

  • Add an internal kernel API /api/block/prependDailyNoteBlock

Download

  • B3log
  • GitHub

entry.title: New release for SiYuan: Improve web page clipping
entry.content:
Overview

This version improves web page clipping, fixes some bugs and improves a lot of details.

Changelogs

Below are the detailed changes in this version.

Enhancement

  • Expand the judgment area for dragging split screen
  • Document floating window supports Open in New Tab
  • Improve marketplace UI
  • Improve browser extension clipping for Zhihu answer
  • Improve the caret position after pressing Backspace in the list
  • Font Size and Code Tab Spaces setting changed to select on the mobile
  • Improve the direction of text, table columns, and horizontal overflow
  • Improve copying database block
  • Improve HTML a and img clipping
  • Export the binding block docs when exporting the doc where the database is located
  • Support database asset image copy-pasting
  • Improve database text, email, url and phone field content escaping
  • Use real theme style value replace var in preview mode
  • Support triggering tag selection via #
  • Improve kernel stability
  • Improve inline memo export
  • Supports configuring Unsplit and Unsplit All hotkeys
  • Improve keymaps searching
  • Refresh the read-only status of a single doc after data synchronization
  • Improve HTML strong clipping
  • Improv drag and drop in outline panel
  • Improve code snippet searching
  • The keyword search logic in-database is changed from OR to AND
  • Improve global search type sorting
  • Improve floating link tip style
  • Improve HTML code block clipping
  • Improve browser extension HTML img clipping
  • Briefly highlight the target block after a block reference jump
  • Improve Ctrl+F to open search dialog
  • Improve database relation field filtering

Abolishment

  • Opening the user guide is no longer supported on iOS
  • Macro definitions are no longer expanded when exporting formulas
  • The Microsoft Store version no longer supports in-app updates checking

Bugfix

  • The compressed package exported from the cloud configuration cannot be imported after being renamed
  • HTML block content escaping is incorrect
  • Inline code rendering error when creating ref doc by F3
  • The database last row misaligned after adding line number field
  • Document exception after focus dragging

Download

  • B3log
  • GitHub

entry.title: New release for SiYuan: Support Windows arm64 and Linux arm64
entry.content:
Overview

This version supports Windows arm64 and Linux arm64, improves web clipping, fixes some defects, and improves many details.

Changelogs

Below are the detailed changes in this version.

Enhancement

  • Dock icon support drag
  • Improve the handling of empty input of query criteria
  • Add deb release package for Linux
  • Display database superscript icon on mobile
  • Disable Ctrl+D in read-only mode
  • Improve HTML h clipping
  • Improve HTML strong clipping
  • Support Windows arm64
  • Support Linux arm64
  • Improve importing Markdown folder
  • Improve pasting nearby some inline elements
  • Improve rollback doc file history
  • Improve Enter outdent after adjusting image size in the list
  • Improve the block fold icon button in the backlink panel
  • Add confirm dialog for Restore Default Layout
  • Improve untitled doc placeholder
  • The browser extension supports Wikipedia formula clipping
  • The User Guide is no longer opened repeatedly when multiple windows exist
  • Improve pasting in code block
  • Improve Expand Down/Up keymaps on Windows
  • Improve HTML img clipping
  • Improve HTML math clipping
  • Do not clip the Edit element next to Wikipedia headings
  • Improve task list redo
  • Add an internal kernel API /api/av/appendAttributeViewDetachedBlocksWithValues
  • Static compile for Linux desktop kernel
  • Improve database handling when importing .sy.zip
  • Improve table parsing

Bugfix

  • The exception occurs in the Settings - About on the Microsoft Store edition
  • The request of PWA files without Authentication Header
  • The primary key sorting of the database panel fails in some cases
  • Optimize typography causes HTML blocks in the list to become invalid
  • Database entries cannot be reordered in some cases

Document

  • Add Japanese user guide

Download

  • B3log
  • GitHub
